page.topic: How to Convert a List Control Between a Static and SQL Data Source
page.description: Learn how a List Control based on static data can be quickly converted to use a SQL database.

discussion.p: Using static data to prototype a List control is common practice. Once prototyping is complete, however, and the List control may need to be converted to use a SQL database. Converting the List control to the SQL data source by hand can be a hassle...unless you use the built-in data source conversion genie.
The *[ui:Convert List datasource to SQL database]* genie allows you to easily export the data from a static data source to a new table or link to an existing table in a SQL database.
You can also convert the data source for a List control from a SQL database to a Static data source using the *[ui:Convert List datasource to static data]*.
Watch the following video to learn how:

video.name: Converting a List Between a Static Data Source and SQL Data Source
